00063 #include <stddef.h>
00064 
00065 /* Header file guard bands */
00066 #ifndef _ICCDEFS_H
00067 #define _ICCDEFS_H
00068 
00069 #pragma pack(4)
00070 
00071 //Get any platform specific prototypes
00072 #include "IccProfLibConf.h"
00073 
00074 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00075 namespace sampleICC {
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 //Include the standard icProfileHeader definition file
00079 #include "icProfileHeader.h"
00080 
00081 // Define signature for SampleICC's use
00082 #define icSigSampleICC ((icSignature)0x53494343) /* 'SICC' */
00083 
00084 //Definitions used for conversion of fixed floating point numbers
00085 typedef icUInt16Number icU1Fixed15Number;
00086 typedef icUInt16Number icU8Fixed8Number;
00087 
00088 
00095 #define icSigDevLabData     ((icColorSpaceSignature) 0x644C6162)  /* 'dLab' */
00096 #define icSigDevXYZData     ((icColorSpaceSignature) 0x6458595A)  /* 'dXYZ' */
00097 
00098 
00104 typedef float              icFloatNumber;
00105 
00109 #define ICFLOATSFX "f"
00110 #define ICFLOATFMT "%f"
00111 
00112 /* For string operations */
00113 typedef char                icChar;
00114 #ifdef WIN32
00115 typedef wchar_t             icWChar;
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 /* Validation Status values */
00119 typedef enum {
00120   icValidateOK,              /*Profile is valid and conforms to specification*/
00121   icValidateWarning,         /*Profile conforms to specification with concerns*/ 
00122   icValidateNonCompliant,    /*Profile does not conform to specification, but may still be useable*/
00123   icValidateCriticalError,   /*Profile does not conform to specification and is not useable*/
00124 } icValidateStatus;
00125
